comment.author: 59352877@N05
comment._content:
Description in slight error - probably should read

Lessons In Bread Making - H M Consulate Nyassa .
Mr J Last Royal Geographical Society

although I cannot swear to Mr Last being in Nyassa at that time I do contest the Hart is not described on this photo - an H by the same hand can be see on CO 1069 - 108 -11 where "First Halt" is certain.
